ygData.subject: Tournament related
ygData.msgSnippet: All who read this and are interested in playing in a tournament, please respond. I hope I am not coming across as too harsh, with the proposed rules so far.

From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

All who read this and are interested in playing in a tournament, 
please respond.

I hope I am not coming across as too harsh, with the proposed rules so 
far.  By requiring posting your team stats every 5 scenarios or so, I 
am hoping that the honor system will work and it will also encourage 
competition.

As far as working on new scenarios, I am skipping ahead to work on a 
scenario very similiar to 'Weakest Link' because I have finished work 
on it.  The teleporters are all lined up, kaing use of teleporters 
much easier, and I am able to beat this scenario at Slaughter with my 
mega Archmage without summoning images or fire elementals.  One man 
teams can beat this scenario if you apply a good strategy.
